thread.title: Picking five winners at Wairoa nets punter $39,000 from $12 multi
thread.title_full: Picking five winners at Wairoa nets punter $39,000 from $12 multi

author: Mat Kermeen
title: Picking five winners at Wairoa nets punter $39,000 from $12 multi
text:
Picking five winners at Wairoa nets punter $39,000 from $12 multi MAT KERMEEN Last updated 15:51, February 24 2017 SUPPLIED 
Sam Weatherley's front-running ride aboard Link Road helped one punter bank $39,000 on Thursday. 
Picking five winners at Thursday's Wairoa gallops meeting has netted one astute punter almost $40,000. 
A $12 multibet over five legs has returned the lucky punter a $39,000 payday. 
The winning sequence came over the last five races on the card and was sealed when outsider Link Road won the last, in what will have been a nerve-racking finish for the holder of the the $12 multi ticket. 
Apprentice jockey Sam Weatherley took the Jason Price-trained Link Road to the lead with around 500 metres to run, but runner-up Smoke House Bay came charging home late to close the gap.
